lukibulrubulru, lakisalru ki papalraini ku sapacapacasane, sasakisakidrane ka gumu si cuming.

lakisalru ki papalraini ki bulru ku sasakisakidrane ku senate., ai makituamiakay tubalre makanaelre, kainaku wailuku.

lakaiseasene ki papalraini ki bulru kwi Liucu, si iyakay lringiailukunganaku ku lamanemaneli, ku syaswalane taubangalranenumi pakisalru nakawane maelanenga.

tarualualupu ikay ki cekelenay ku ama.
My dad is a hunter of the tribe.

saka lavavalakeana ku ama si agini lukamaungu mualatadre, lailuku ku bakale si kwange.
When I was little, my dad and uncle would go out at night with hunting knives and guns.
我今天七點到學校。: 我小的時候，爸爸和叔叔會在晚上出門，帶著獵刀和獵槍。

luka liarenga lailuku ku panalini ku waudriudripi.
At daybreak, they returned with their prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 天亮時，他們就會帶著獵到的獵物回來。

yakay luka babui yakay luka bubutu avavale ikay ku padavathane.
Sometimes it was a boar, sometimes a flying squirrel, and occasionally a pheasant.
我今天七點到學校。: 有時候是山豬、有時候是飛鼠，偶爾也會有雉雞。

Lapavavalanenga ikay ki sangangudane ki cekele, pakisupilri ki cekele.
They would divide the prey at the entrance of the village and share it with the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 他們會在村口將獵物分好，分享給族人。

laka tamakavaladhaneli ki ama ku atupalrane alupu.

我今天七點到學校。: 我每次都會吵著爸爸，要跟著爸爸去打獵。

ku ama laiyakay lukadraungasu, nawilukunga muswane alupu.

我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸說等我長大了他再帶我一起去。

kay yacekele kay lamalala arakay ku kateme ki waudriudripi, lakalrigili aratukulru si lrenege drepete ki kateme.

我今天七點到學校。: 部落的男人也會用陷阱抓獵物，他們會製作套索陷阱和石壓式陷阱。

ku ama malrigili darepe ku satukulrane kateme, ku ama laiyakay, kikay sarakayyane saramete ki padavathane, lripudriadringayta drele ku tangukakaiyane ki waudriudripi kay kateme la sarare ku kateme pikay ki tangukakaiyane ki waudriudripi ku kadalranane dadavace.
My dad is very good at making lasso traps. Dad said that this is used to catch pheasants. We have to carefully observe the footprints of the prey, and the traps should be placed on the path of the prey.

pakay ku asara tupapalrane ki tarudraudrange alupu, lukakaiya lakicakwanaku dringi kay dringaili, ikasulivate pwalra ki waudriudripi.

sadrele ku ama laiyakay nakwane, lukabibilrili lritara kamaniaku kudra magagarangenga ka taralupu.

luubalriu, lalri pakisupilri ki sakacekele ku nipanane ku waudriudripi.

Saka2022kacayli, kay sihu pakaygi ku kacalrilrisyanan ki nibungusiw ku nagane.
In 2022, the government announced that indigenous identification cards can include tribal names separately.
我今天七點到學校。: 在2022年，政府召開了原住民身分證可單列族名的會議。

Maulainga kivavaga ki sihu ku akasivavalane nagane kacalrilrisyane ki nibungusiw acengecenge ki cekele Kulele Gadhu.
I interviewed Kulele Gadhu, a young tribal member who has long been advocating for the inclusion of tribal names on identification cards.
我今天七點到學校。: 我訪問了長期向政府爭取身分證「單列族名」的部落青年Kulele Gadhu。

Mapapelaelanganay ki lasu ku alrikapane kayki taelratelradhane mwaki dane lini.
We had arranged to visit his home this holiday for the interview.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和他約定好這個假日到他家訪問他。

Ikayki takivavaganeli ku tatwaladhane ki naganeini lasiwkaynga nakwane ki wacekecekeleini si cekeleini.
During the interview, he introduced to me the origin of his name and also introduced me to his family and tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 在訪問的過程中，他向我介紹了他的名字的由來，也帶我認識了他的家人、他的部落。

Lakivagaku inyane asukakecenge pabalrithi kay nagane malisi ku natapangimiamyame?
I asked him why he insisted on changing his name. Wasn’t the old registration method sufficient?
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他為什麼堅持要改名，舊的登記方式不好嗎?

Laiyakay tubalre nakwane, asiluiyane kay pacase ki ciukuku kailrimaka pacengecenge pelaela ku naganeini, kaydruma laikay lu daulu “kusinsi” kavay ki lasu, lamatilrulrupi.
He told me that using Chinese characters could not accurately convey his name, and others would still call him \Ku Xian Sheng
我今天七點到學校。: \" which resulted in many jokes being made."
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/35245/5: 他對我說，因為用中文字並不能準確的傳達他的名字，其他人還會叫他「古先生」，也因此鬧出不少笑話。

Kulele Gadhu kay kacalrilrisyanane pacase ku nagane patengatengane ka naganeta. kay naganali atalingikayyane ki zukunay retetesanenay takawmaumasanenay, anatumane laarutapangale ku kacalrisyane pasyaulrulri ku naganeini.”
Gadhu said, “The names written in indigenous languages are our true names. My name represents our ethnic group, our family, our identity. I hope more fellow tribespeople can reclaim their own names.”
我今天七點到學校。: Gadhu說：「原住民語書寫的名字才是我們真正的名字。我的名字代表了我們的族群、我們的家族、我們的身分，希望能有更多族人找回自己的名字。」

Everyone loved my grandmother’s stall. Many people bought the chilis and African eggplants, and many people came to taste the dishes she cooked.
我今天七點到學校。: 大家很喜歡奶奶的攤位，辣椒和車輪茄很多人買，許多人來品嘗她煮的菜餚。

ku tudamaini ku maungu si duray ka pagay malimeme turamuru kiamurikay ki badhabadha, lakela makanaelre ki siubaynay siugu.
The ferns and sticky rice she cooked were delicious, as well as the braised pork with maqaw pepper and wild boar meat. The flavors attracted many customers, and everyone lined up at our stall.
我今天七點到學校。: 她煮的蕨菜和糯米飯非常好吃，受很多客人歡迎，大家都來我們攤位排隊。

Laagaga kay kayngu ladawdaulaku ki badhabadha. yathilaku karalealeale, “ngilralredrekenay kaylacenge, kaikanipukeselyrane, bwala kirimwa langay.”
While my grandmother was cooking, I was on the side attracting customers. I shouted, \The vegetables are self-grown

kayaungane kyabulrwaku patharukkay ki supungu si akaneane kacalrisyane ki lrigilane. kilringaw ku sakwalrialri madu siwbay.
Through this event, I learned about indigenous plants and food and experienced the hard work of running a stall.
